name: One Small Favor
description:
Jump in the story of an average new guy in town entering a night club in this first-person roleplaying game. You don't know anybody, nobody knows you, first impressions mean everything. Meet new people, dance, drink, go crazy, hook up...

Complete missions and sidetasks, navigate through branching dialogue options and make this night a success! The game consists of one main story and several rewarding sidetasks accessible by talking to various people around the nightclub.

Keybinds
Movement - WASD
Jump - Spacebar
Interact - Left mouse button
